Lt: Col. Alexander Vindman testified before the House Intelligence Committee during a public impeachment hearing, confirming that he had testified against President Donald Trump.
The claim that President Trump fired Vin: Trump group, which included a screenshot of a tweet by Scott Dworkin, co-founder of the Democratic Coalition.
The Facebook post was flagged by Faceboo: indicating that it was questionable in terms of authenticity.
The source of the claim: Scott Dworkin's tweet, was based on a story from Talking Points Memo, which reported comments made by National Security Agency Adviser Robert O'Brien during an interview with Margaret Brennan on CBS News' "Face the Nation."
